button.name: playheadRw
button.label: Transport.Rewind
button.info:
Moves the playhead back by one bar with each press.
Press and hold to return to the beginning of the project.

button.name: playheadFf
button.label: Transport.Forward
button.info: Moves the playhead forward by one bar with each press.

button.name: playheadReturn
button.label: Transport.Go to Beginning
button.info: Returns the playhead to the beginning of the project.

button.name: playPause
button.label: Transport.Play/Pause
button.info:
Toggles playback state between playing and paused.

Press and hold to return to the beginning of the project.

Note: When 'cycle' mode is engaged, repeated presses will also return to the beginning.

dial.name: trackVolume
dial.label: Track Controls.Volume (CC7)
dial.info: Controls the volume level of the selected track using CC7 on MIDI channel 1.

dial.name: trackPan
dial.label: Track Controls.Pan (CC10)
dial.info: Controls pan for the selected track using CC10 on MIDI channel 1.

dial.name: midiAftertouchCh1
dial.label: MIDI Controls.Aftertouch (Ch 1)
dial.info: Controls aftertouch (channel pressure) on MIDI Channel 1.

dial.name: midiDrawbar1
dial.label: MIDI Controls.Vintage B3 Organ.Drawbar 1 (CC70)
dial.info: Controls drawbar 1 for the Vintage B3 Organ using CC70 on MIDI channel 1.

dial.name: midiDrawbar2
dial.label: MIDI Controls.Vintage B3 Organ.Drawbar 2 (CC71)
dial.info: Controls drawbar 2 for the Vintage B3 Organ using CC71 on MIDI channel 1.

dial.name: midiDrawbar3
dial.label: MIDI Controls.Vintage B3 Organ.Drawbar 3 (CC72)
dial.info: Controls drawbar 3 for the Vintage B3 Organ using CC72 on MIDI channel 1.

dial.name: midiDrawbar4
dial.label: MIDI Controls.Vintage B3 Organ.Drawbar 4 (CC73)
dial.info: Controls drawbar 4 for the Vintage B3 Organ using CC73 on MIDI channel 1.

dial.name: midiDrawbar5
dial.label: MIDI Controls.Vintage B3 Organ.Drawbar 5 (CC74)
dial.info: Controls drawbar 5 for the Vintage B3 Organ using CC74 on MIDI channel 1.

dial.name: midiDrawbar6
dial.label: MIDI Controls.Vintage B3 Organ.Drawbar 6 (CC75)
dial.info: Controls drawbar 6 for the Vintage B3 Organ using CC75 on MIDI channel 1.

dial.name: midiDrawbar7
dial.label: MIDI Controls.Vintage B3 Organ.Drawbar 7 (CC76)
dial.info: Controls drawbar 7 for the Vintage B3 Organ using CC76 on MIDI channel 1.

dial.name: midiDrawbar8
dial.label: MIDI Controls.Vintage B3 Organ.Drawbar 8 (CC77)
dial.info: Controls drawbar 8 for the Vintage B3 Organ using CC77 on MIDI channel 1.

dial.name: midiDrawbar9
dial.label: MIDI Controls.Vintage B3 Organ.Drawbar 9 (CC78)
dial.info: Controls drawbar 9 for the Vintage B3 Organ using CC78 on MIDI channel 1.

dial.name: midiDrawbar78
dial.label: MIDI Controls.Vintage B3 Organ.Drawbars 7+8 (CC79)
dial.info: Controls drawbars 7 and 8 (together) for the Vintage B3 Organ using CC79 on MIDI channel 1.

dial.name: midiLeslieRotator
dial.label: MIDI Controls.Vintage B3 Organ.Rotation (CC80)
dial.info: Controls the rotating speaker effect for the Vintage B3 Organ using CC79 on MIDI channel 1.

dial.name: horizontalZoom
dial.label: View.Horizontal Zoom
dial.info: Turn to zoom in and out of track view.

dial.name: playhead
dial.label: Transport.Playhead (Bars)
dial.info:
Turn to move the playhead backwards and forwards by 1 bar at a time.
Press to return to the beginning of the project.

orbiter.name: midiPitchMod
orbiter.label: MIDI Controls.Modulation & Pitch (CC1, Ch 1)
orbiter.info:
Turn controls modulation (CC1) on MIDI channel 1.
Tilt Y controls pitch bend on MIDI channel 1.

Note: Tilt X is unassigned.

orbiter.name: midiPitchAftertouch
orbiter.label: MIDI Controls.Aftertouch & Pitch (Ch 1)
orbiter.info:
Turn controls aftertouch (channel pressure) on MIDI channel 1.
Tilt Y controls pitch bend on MIDI channel 1.

Note: Tilt X is unassigned.

orbiter.name: horizontalZoom
orbiter.label: View.Horizontal Zoom
orbiter.info:
Turn to zoom in and out of track view.

Note: Tilt is unassigned.

orbiter.name: playhead
orbiter.label: Transport.Playhead (Bars)
orbiter.info:
Turn to move the playhead backwards and forwards by 1 bar at a time.

Note: Tilt is unassigned.
